rules_text: When Cosmic Restitcher enters, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. If it's a creature card with mana value 4 or less, return it to the battlefield instead.
flavor_text: [i]One fateful evening, a mysterious face passed through an Ar'Ghul checkpoint with a sly grin. “I know the magic that you seek, Nox. Are you willing to pay its price?”[/i]
